author: "Ricci, Bartolomeo, 1542-1613"
title: "De actibus humanis, eorumque differentijs, & proprietatibus, libri tres. Additis duabus elucubrationibus, altera contra vsum probabilitatum, altera contra nonam propositionem damnatam in Decreto SS.D.N. 2. Martij 1679. Authore fr. Bartholomaeo Riccio Neap"
